CustomField.description: Used when branches are dependent on answers from other questions (and not the immediate question). Delimited by semicolons (";") in the form "Field_Name__c=value,value2;Field_Name2__c=value", etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used when branches are dependent on answers from other questions (and not the immediate question). Delimited by semicolons (";") in the form "Field_Name__c=value,value2;Field_Name2__c=value", etc.
CustomField.label: External Render Flags
